ECUACIONES DE CUARTO GRADO - Ejercicio 1 - ft. Casio Classwiz

\begin{aligned}\n&\mathrm{CAS} \perp \square \text { . }[\mathrm{L} \triangle \mathrm{SS}] \mathrm{WI} Z \mathrm{LAX}\\\n&x^{4}+7 x^{3}+5 x^{2}-31 x-30=1\\\n&\begin{array}{l}\n{x^{2}+8 x+15=2} \\\n{(x+5)(x+3)}\n\end{array}\\\n&x+5=0\n\end{aligned}[imath]{x^{2}+8 x+15=2} [/imath] [imath]{(x+5)(x+3)}[/imath]
